issue.title: [CF 513] Holy power x5
issue.body:
Condition for Ressource > Holy Power, stacks can't go up to 5 (just 3). (checked r528 before posting)
Thanks ! :)


> Posted by CurseForge user teclis28 | Imported from CurseForge issue #513 | Raw

comments.body:
The condition definitely only goes to 3. Are you sure you are looking at the right one?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
